name: HookBit
description:
Get as high of a score as you can in 60 seconds! Green Crystals give 10 points, Blue Crystals give 20 points, and Yellow Crystals give 50 points! If you are able to reach your spaceship that doubles your points!

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right Arrows = Left/Right

Space/W/Up Arrow = Jump

Left Shift = Reverse the rotation of the planet's orbit you are in!

F = FullScreen (Escape to exit)

M = Toggle music on and off

Mention your high scores in the comments or reviews of this game and I will put them below!

Recorded High Scores:

1600 Points

This game was made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam where the theme was Joined Together.




I have the rights to use all of the assets in this game. The music and orbits were made by me. 

Spaceship: https://opengameart.org/content/deep-space-exploration-ship
